documentation.text:
Keeps track of Blacklists and can check if sender and reciever are configured to allow a transfer.
Only administrators can update the Blacklists.
Sets an address's blacklisting status.  Only administrators should be allowed to update this.
Clears out an address from the blacklist.  Only administrators should be allowed to update this.

Determine if the a sender is allowed to send to the receiver.
If either the sender or receiver is blacklisted, then the transfer should be denied
Enable or disable the Blacklist enforcement
Public function that allows admins to remove an address from a Blacklist
Public function that allows admins to remove an address from a Blacklist

Keeps track of Blacklists and can check if sender and reciever are configured to allow a transfer.
Only administrators can update the Blacklists.
Sets an address's blacklisting status.  Only administrators should be allowed to update this.
Clears out an address from the blacklist.  Only administrators should be allowed to update this.

Determine if the a sender is allowed to send to the receiver.
If either the sender or receiver is blacklisted, then the transfer should be denied
Enable or disable the Blacklist enforcement
Public function that allows admins to remove an address from a Blacklist
Public function that allows admins to remove an address from a Blacklist

addToBlacklist(address).notice: Public function that allows admins to remove an address from a Blacklist

checkBlacklistAllowed(address,address).notice: Determine if the a sender is allowed to send to the receiver. If either the sender or receiver is blacklisted, then the transfer should be denied

removeFromBlacklist(address).notice: Public function that allows admins to remove an address from a Blacklist

setBlacklistEnabled(bool).notice: Enable or disable the Blacklist enforcement

userdoc.notice: Keeps track of Blacklists and can check if sender and reciever are configured to allow a transfer. Only administrators can update the Blacklists.
